IntegrateBastion.Name: Integrate with Bastion Turns
IntegrateBastion.Hint: Automatically process venture results when D&D5e bastion turn summaries are created.

PostChatSummary.Name: Post Venture Summary Cards
PostChatSummary.Hint: Create a venture summary chat card after each bastion turn.

HideVentureHirelings.Name: Hide Venture Hirelings
HideVentureHirelings.Hint: When enabled, venture-enabled facilities hide bastion hireling slots.

DebugLogging.Name: Enable Debug Logging
DebugLogging.Hint: If enabled, the module writes debug messages to the browser console.

Sheet.EnabledHint: If enabled, this special facility resolves venture profit/loss each bastion turn.
Sheet.GpPerPointHint: How much GP each profit/loss point is worth.
Sheet.NaturalOneDegradesProfitDieHint: When enabled, a raw 1 on the venture profit roll lowers current profit die by one step (if possible).
Sheet.AutoUseTreasuryLossHint: When enabled, venture treasury is used automatically to cover deficits before any character funds.
Sheet.AutoCoverLossHint: When enabled, venture deficits are paid from the actor's GP before degradation.
Sheet.BoonsHint: Configured boons: {count}. Format each line as Name | Cost | Description | Reward UUID (optional) | Purchases Per Bastion Turn (optional; default 1, use 'unlimited' for no cap) | Purchase Window (optional: default, loss, profit) | group=<name> (optional) | group-limit=<n> (optional).
Sheet.BoonsDropHint: Tip: drag an Item or Active Effect onto the boons field to insert an @UUID reward reference.
Sheet.ActiveEffectsEmpty: No venture effects on this facility.

Chat.Title: {actor}'s Venture Results
Chat.ModifierTurnsTick: {before} turns remaining, decrements to {after} after this turn
Chat.NetLine: Income: {income} gp | Outgoings: {outgoings} gp | Net: {net} gp | Treasury: {treasury} gp
Chat.BoonGroupLimitUnlimited: Group '{group}' purchased this bastion turn: {purchased} (no group limit)
Chat.BoonPurchaseWindowBlocked: Not purchasable this turn due to purchase window ({mode}).
Chat.DeficitCovered: Remaining deficit of {character} gp was automatically covered from character funds.
Chat.DeficitCoveredManual: {decider} chose to cover the remaining {character} gp deficit from character funds.
Chat.DeficitCoveredManualInventory: {decider} chose to cover the remaining {character} gp deficit from character inventory funds.
Chat.DeficitSources: Loss coverage used {treasury} gp from venture treasury and {character} gp from character funds.
Chat.DeficitDeclined: {decider} declined to cover this venture's deficit.
Chat.DeficitTimedOut: No response from {decider}; deficit coverage timed out.
Chat.DeficitInsufficient: Insufficient character funds to cover the remaining {deficit} gp deficit.
Chat.Grew: Venture momentum increased. Profit die improved.
Chat.NaturalOneDegraded: Natural 1 on profit roll: profit die degraded.
Chat.Failed: The venture failed and has been disabled.

BoonEditor.Title: Edit Venture Boons
BoonEditor.Help: Manage boon entries in a table. Empty names are ignored when saving. Drag an Item or Active Effect onto a Reward field to insert a UUID link, or use the wand button to generate a venture modifier Active Effect reward. Purchase Window controls when the boon can be bought; break-even qualifies as both profit and loss. Group and Group Turn Limit let multiple boons share one per-turn purchase cap.
BoonEditor.ModifierBuilderHelp: Create an Active Effect reward for this boon. It will be stored on the facility and linked into the Reward UUID field.
BoonEditor.ModifierBuilderScopeAll: Applies to all ventures (instead of this one)
BoonEditor.ModifierBuilderDurationModeNextBastionTu: 1 Bastion Turn (expires at character's next bastion turn)
BoonEditor.ModifierBuilderDurationFormula: Duration Formula (used if fixed duration empty)
BoonEditor.Name: Name
BoonEditor.GroupsHelp: Create a group, set its per-turn limit, then drag boon chips between cards to assign or unassign them.

EffectSummary.Label: Venture Modifier Summary
EffectSummary.BastionDurationNextTurn: Duration: 1 bastion turn (expires at next bastion turn).
EffectSummary.TemplateNote: Template effect: this is stored on the venture and copied when a boon is purchased.
EffectSummary.NoConsume: Does not consume duration each bastion turn
EffectSummary.NoChanges: No die or bonus modifiers set.

Prompt.Title: Cover Venture Deficit?
Prompt.Content:
{decider}, how do you want to cover this venture loss?

Actor: {actor}
Venture: {venture}
Total Deficit: {deficit} gp
From Venture Treasury: {treasuryCover} gp
From Character Funds Needed: {characterCover} gp
Total Inventory Currency Value: {availableInventoryGp} gp
Prompt.ClaimContent: How much GP do you want to claim from {venture}?

Errors.GMOnly: Only a GM can purchase venture boons.
Errors.NotEnoughTreasury: This venture does not have enough treasury for that boon.
Errors.NoTreasury: This venture has no treasury to claim.
Errors.NotOwner: You must own this actor (or be GM) to manage venture treasury.
Errors.InvalidClaimAmount: Enter a claim amount between 1 and {maxAmount} gp.
Errors.BoonDropMissingUuid: Dropped document is missing a UUID reference.
Errors.BoonModifierNoFacility: No facility document found for creating a modifier reward effect.
Errors.BoonModifierNoChanges: No modifier values were set. Add at least one die or bonus change.
Errors.BoonModifierCreateFailed: Failed to create the modifier reward effect.
Errors.BoonSaveFailed: Failed to save boon changes to the facility.
Errors.BoonTurnLimitReached: This boon has already reached its purchase limit for this bastion turn ({purchased}/{limit}).
Errors.BoonGroupTurnLimitReached: This boon's group '{group}' has reached its purchase limit for this bastion turn ({purchased}/{limit}).
Errors.BoonPurchaseWindowBlocked: This boon cannot be purchased this turn due to its purchase window ({mode}).
Errors.StaleVentureSummary: This summary is from an older bastion turn. Use the latest venture summary card.
Errors.BoonRewardUnsupported: Unsupported boon reward type '{type}' for reward '{reward}'. Use an Item or ActiveEffect UUID.

Notifications.BoonPurchasedReward: Purchased boon '{boon}' for {venture} and granted reward '{reward}'.
Notifications.BoonModifierLinked: Linked reward effect '{effect}' to boon row.
Notifications.BoonRewardUuidInserted: Inserted boon reward UUID into the boons list.

enabled.name: Venture Modifier: Enabled
enabled.description: If true, this venture modifier can affect venture turn processing.

applyToAllVentures.name: Venture Modifier: Apply To All Ventures
applyToAllVentures.description: If true, this modifier applies to every venture on the actor.

facilityId.name: Venture Modifier: Facility Scope
facilityId.description: Facility id/uuid/name this modifier targets when not applying globally.

profitDieStep.name: Venture Modifier: Profit Die Step
profitDieStep.description: Shifts profit die up/down by die steps (for example +1 from d8 to d10).

profitDieOverride.name: Venture Modifier: Profit Die Override
profitDieOverride.description: Forces profit die to this value (d4/d6/d8/d10/d12).

minProfitDie.name: Venture Modifier: Minimum Profit Die
minProfitDie.description: Prevents profit die from dropping below this value.

lossDieStep.name: Venture Modifier: Loss Die Step
lossDieStep.description: Shifts loss die up/down by die steps.

lossDieOverride.name: Venture Modifier: Loss Die Override
lossDieOverride.description: Forces loss die to this value (d4/d6/d8/d10/d12).

maxLossDie.name: Venture Modifier: Maximum Loss Die
maxLossDie.description: Caps the computed loss die so it cannot be higher than this value.

successThresholdOverride.name: Venture Modifier: Successes To Grow Override
successThresholdOverride.description: Overrides successes required for profit die growth (for example set to 1 for 'grow after one success').

profitRollBonus.name: Venture Modifier: Profit Roll Bonus
profitRollBonus.description: Flat bonus added to the rolled profit result each venture turn.

durationFormula.name: Venture Modifier: Duration Formula
durationFormula.description: Roll formula used at purchase time to determine remaining bastion turns when no fixed turns are set.

consumePerTurn.name: Venture Modifier: Consume Per Bastion Turn
consumePerTurn.description: If true, remainingTurns decreases by 1 on each bastion turn.

bastionDurationType.name: Venture Modifier: Special Duration Type
bastionDurationType.description: Use 'nextBastionTurn' to make this modifier expire at the actor's next bastion turn.

remainingTurns.name: Venture Modifier: Remaining Bastion Turns
remainingTurns.description: Number of bastion turns remaining before the modifier expires.

expireNextTurn.name: Bastion Duration: Expire Next Bastion Turn
expireNextTurn.description: Set to true to expire this non-venture Active Effect at the actor's next bastion turn.

remainingTurns.name: Bastion Duration Remaining Turns
remainingTurns.description: Manual turn counter for non-venture Active Effects consumed each bastion turn.

durationFormula.name: Bastion Duration Formula
durationFormula.description: If set (and remaining turns is blank), this formula is rolled on reward grant to set remaining turns.

consumePerTurn.name: Bastion Duration Consume Per Turn
consumePerTurn.description: If true, non-venture Active Effect remaining turns are decremented each bastion turn.
